statements: SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 1;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High';
SELECT alert_description FROM alerts WHERE location_id = 5 ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_type, alert_description, alert_timestamp FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Low' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'fire' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_description FROM alerts WHERE location_id = 10 ORDER BY alert_id ASC;
SELECT alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND location_id IN (5, 7) ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT alert_description FROM alerts WHERE alert_timestamp < '2022-06-01' AND location_id = 3 ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'flood' ORDER BY location_id;
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_description, alert_time FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Warning';
SELECT alert_id, alert_type FROM alerts WHERE alert_time BETWEEN '2021-05-01' AND '2021-05-31';
SELECT alert_id, alert_description FROM alerts WHERE alert_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High Priority' ORDER BY alert_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT notification_id, notification_type FROM notifications WHERE notification_time >= '2022-01-01' AND notification_time <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT alert_description FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Low Priority' AND alert_time > '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_type LIKE '%Urgent%' ORDER BY notification_time ASC;
SELECT notification_id, notification_description FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High Priority';
SELECT alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT notification_type, notification_message, notification_timestamp FROM notifications WHERE notification_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_name, system_status FROM irrigation_system WHERE system_status = 'Active' ORDER BY last_checked ASC;
SELECT notification_type, COUNT(notification_id) AS notification_count FROM notifications GROUP BY notification_type;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT notification_id, notification_type, notification_timestamp FROM notifications WHERE notification_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND notification_type = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM irrigation_system WHERE system_status IN ('Active', 'Offline') ORDER BY last_checked ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT system_name, system_status FROM irrigation_system ORDER BY system_name ASC;
SELECT alert_type, COUNT(*) as total_alerts FROM alerts GROUP BY alert_type HAVING total_alerts > 5 ORDER BY total_alerts DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT notification_id, notification_message FROM notifications WHERE notification_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_id, location, installation_date FROM irrigation_system ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT log_id, system_id, log_message FROM system_logs WHERE system_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT alert_type, alert_description FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_type, notification_message FROM alerts JOIN notifications ON alerts.alert_id = notifications.alert_id;
SELECT location, installation_date FROM irrigation_system ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT alert_description, alert_timestamp FROM alerts WHERE alert_device_id = 1;
SELECT alert_id, alert_description, alert_device_id FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM alert_notifications WHERE notification_sent = true;
SELECT system_name, system_location FROM irrigation_system WHERE system_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC, alert_device_id ASC;
SELECT alert_description, alert_device_id, alert_timestamp FROM alerts WHERE alert_device_id = 1;
SELECT alert_id, alert_description, alert_timestamp, device_name FROM alerts JOIN devices ON alerts.alert_device_id = devices.device_id;
SELECT system_name, system_status FROM irrigation_system WHERE system_status = 'active';
SELECT notification_id, notification_name FROM notification_types ORDER BY notification_id DESC;
